article.description: Charles Williams scored 25 points as Howard kept North Carolina A&T winless in Division I with an 84-53 victory on Saturday night.
article.headline: Howard rolls past North Carolina A&T 84-53
article.linkText: Howard rolls past North Carolina A&T 84-53
article.story: WASHINGTON -- Charles Williams scored 25 points as Howard kept North Carolina A&T winless in Division I with an 84-53 victory on Saturday night. Williams was 7 of 14 from the floor including four from beyond the arc for the Bison (7-20, 4-8 MEAC). Damon Collins added a season-high 21 points and five assists, Tyler Stone had 13 points and Solomon Mangham had 10 points and five boards. The team was 8 of 22 (36 percent) from 3-point range compared to 2 of 12 (17 percent) for the Aggies (2-25, 0-12). North Carolina A&T has not beaten a Division I team this season. The Aggies' only victories were over Division II Greensboro College in the season opener and NAIA Division II member Allen University on Feb. 7. Davaris McGowens scored 19 points and Aaron Scales had 14 for the Aggies. The two players accounted for 33 of the team's 53 total points.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
